wrote: 
I honestly cannot tell you how grateful and appreciative we are about our relationship with you (and with and 
— it's incredibly comforting and helpful to consistently be on the same page. Thanks as always, and we'll be in 
touch per usual. 
From: (NY) (FBI) <> 
Sent: Monday, January 27, 2020 19:14 
To: 
Subject: RE: Press Conference at Epstein's 
I'm sure, not a problem, we've always been on the same page. Up the chain of command may be a different 
story©. 
SSA 
FBI New York 
On 
Jan 27, 2020 7:10 PM, " 
It was a complete surprise man. We've been dealing with all kinds of after-affects all day. 
From: (NY) (FBI) <> 
Sent: Monday, January 27, 2020 19:08 
To: 
) 
Cc: 
<E> 
Subject: RE: Press Conference at Epstein's 
>  wrote: 
(NY) (FBI) 
Ok thanks for getting back to me. Just caught a lot of people off guard over here, sounds like it did 
with you as well. No worries, talk to you soon. 
SSA 
FBI New York 
On Jan 
27, 2020 5:47 PM, " 
It 
wrote: 
This morning's press conference took us by surprise -- our supervisors did not say anything to us about it in 
EFTA00031722

advance, and in particular had no idea that there would be comments about the active investigation. Our 
understanding now is that the event was in connection with Safe Horizon, the victim services organization, and that 
Geoff answered at least ones question about the investigation, relating to Prince Andrew. We just heard 
from that he spoke to about it (I think earlier today?) so everybody is playing catch up. 
----Original Message 
From: (NY) (FBI). 
Sent: Monday, January 27, 2020 15:28 
To: 
Cc: (NY) (FBI) 
Subject: Press Conference at Epstein's 
MCF 
All, 
I have been getting some questions about the press conference that occurred today at Epstein's mansion, do any of 
you know that was about? Our media affairs department has been getting questions. In addition, our Victim 
Specialists have been fielding calls from irate victims who weren't notified. 
https://twittencom/AaronKatersky/status/1221833096686903299/photo/ 1 
thanks, 
SSA-
Squad C-20 
Crimes Against Children/Huinan Trafficking FBI New York 
office 
mobile 
EFTA00031723
